subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Area Planning and Renewal
lead_paragraph: With the owner Stan Kroenke becoming a bogeyman to fans who fear he will move the Rams back to California, Missouri’s governor is expected to appoint a task force to work on a plan for a new stadium.
snippet: With the owner Stan Kroenke becoming a bogeyman to fans who fear he will move the Rams back to California, Missouri’s governor is expected to appoint a task force to work on a plan for a new stadium.
